trans-unit.source: Provides data about an aborted workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce dati su un'istanza del flusso di lavoro interrotta.

trans-unit.source: When a workflow hosted by a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication> is aborted, the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Aborted%2A> handler is invoked and the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Completed%2A> handler is not invoked.
trans-unit.target: Quando un flusso di lavoro ospitato da un oggetto <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication> viene interrotto, viene richiamato il gestore <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Aborted%2A>, ma non il gestore <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Completed%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example inspects the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationAbortedEventArgs> passed into the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Aborted%2A> handler of a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication> instance and displays information about why workflow was aborted.
trans-unit.target: L'esempio di codice seguente controlla l'oggetto <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationAbortedEventArgs> passato nel gestore <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Aborted%2A> di un'istanza <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication> e visualizza le informazioni relative ai motivi dell'interruzione del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: Gets the exception that provides information about why the workflow instance was aborted
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'eccezione che fornisce informazioni sul perché è interrotta l'istanza del flusso di lavoro

trans-unit.source: The exception that provides information about why the workflow instance was aborted.
trans-unit.target: Eccezione che fornisce informazioni sul perché è interrotta l'istanza del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: When a workflow hosted by a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication> is aborted, the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Aborted%2A> handler is invoked and the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Completed%2A> handler is not invoked.
trans-unit.target: Quando un flusso di lavoro ospitato da un oggetto <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication> viene interrotto, viene richiamato il gestore <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Aborted%2A>, ma non il gestore <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Completed%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example inspects the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationAbortedEventArgs> passed into the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Aborted%2A> handler of a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication> instance and displays information about why workflow was aborted.
trans-unit.target: L'esempio di codice seguente controlla l'oggetto <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationAbortedEventArgs> passato nel gestore <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Aborted%2A> di un'istanza <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication> e visualizza le informazioni relative ai motivi dell'interruzione del flusso di lavoro.
